Question
========

Maurits de Herder finds in a *random sample* of 1000 people that if there were elections now, 35% would vote for the VVD. The *margin of error* of this result at a *confidence level* of 95% is equal to

Answerlist
----------

* 0.02
* 0.03
* 0.04

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.02: Incorrect
* 0.03: Correct
* 0.04: Incorrect
